text:
I can't believe this Pixar-like short was entirely made with AI. Here's exactly how:

@BillyWoodward used a full stack of AI tools to create it:
→ Midjourney: for the stunning visuals and style.
→ Nano Banana: for camera angles and edits.
→ Seedance + Kling 2.5: for motion and animation.
→ Suno: for the music track in one go.
→ Elevenlabs: for sound effects.

AI can create images and clips. You're still the one creating it.
Quality comes from the story you choose to tell.

PS: I test AI tools daily and keep an updated list of my favorites. Check it out here: best-ai.blog.
